mod.name: The Kombatant
mod.description: Mortal Kombat themed mod. Character Select Screen by Poser96 on Deviant Art. Mortal Kombat is property of Netherrealm Studios. This is just a work of love for MK.

cards.name: Guard
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Guard+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.description: Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: High Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

thekombatant:Kombo
Deal 4 damage.

cards.name: Leg Sweep+

thekombatant:Kombo

cards.name: Throw

If the target was planning to attack, gain 4 Block.

thekombatant:EX: This kard isn't Exhausted.

Exhaust.

relics.name: Shinnok's Amulet
relics.description: At the end of your turn, Retain 1 Kard for each unspent Bar (33%) of Meter.
relics.flavorText: Dark Tidings from the Past and Future.

relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Bar (33%) of Meter.
relics.flavorText: You feel the Lifeforce of Earthrealm.

relics.name: Core: Cyrax
relics.description: When you play 5 Attacks in a turn, apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Thekombatant:Chilled
keywords.description: Creature will deal less damage, the amount is halved after each of it's attacks.

keywords.name: Thekombatant:Extender
keywords.description: Draw 1 kard and gain 1 [E] but deal 15% less damage for the rest of this turn.

keywords.name: Thekombatant:Kombo
keywords.description: Kombo kards must be played after regular attack kards. (Unless specified.)

keywords.name: Thekombatant:Meter_Burn
keywords.description: Will spend 1 bar (33%) of Meter to apply this additional effect.

keywords.name: Thekombatant:Mixup
keywords.description: Mixup damage is 200% effective against Block.

keywords.name: Thekombatant:Special Cancel
keywords.description: If you follow this Kard with a Special, it will cost 1 less [E] .

keywords.name: Thekombatant:Toasty
keywords.description: When attacked this creature will take additional damage. Lasts until the end of the round.

keywords.name: Thekombatant:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
